\documentclass[border=6pt]{standalone}

\usepackage{qcircuit}

\begin{document}

\Qcircuit @C=1em @R=.7em {
& \gate{H} & \gate{X} & \qw & \ctrl{1} & \qw & \gate{X} & \gate{H} & \qw \\
& \gate{H}  & \gate{X} & \qw & \ctrl{1} & \qw & \gate{X} & \gate{H} & \qw \\
& \gate{H} & \gate{X} & \gate{H}  & \targ & \gate{H} & \gate{X} & \gate{H} \\
}

\end{document}
